Good versus evil battles were fought in this epic biblical story of heroism . This narrative presents Mordecai ( Robert Miano ), an honest Jew , and Haman ( Thaao Penghlis ) , an evil prime minister who completely beyond the control of the Persian king Xerxes young . Haman is second in authority after the Persian king and wants to be worshiped by all . But Mordecai did not bow before him . This attitude raises the ire of Haman and does create evil plans against this Jewish leader and his povo.Resta then to Esther 's cousin Mordecai , the difficult task of winning the hearts of the king , and also to expose Haman and his attempts treason to save his people . Based on the biblical story of Esther , this is a beautiful adaptation that reveals the grandeur of a Jewess who demonstrated courage, faith and obedience .
